RevisionEvent.Note: BARREL Instruments: SPASE 2.3.0 XML resource description, last known revision, metadata submitted by LFB, reviewed by Reine Chimiak
BARREL Instruments: SPASE description revised to standardize the Information URL content for all BARREL instrument descriptions, upgrade to SPASE 2.4.0, metadata submitted by LFB

ResourceHeader.Description:
This document describes the BARREL Balloon 2L Engineering Data Interface.
The BARREL Balloon 2L EDI performs analog to digital conversion, ADC, of key temperatures, voltages, and currents. There are eight inputs of voltage and current pairs, four inputs of voltage only and sixteen inputs nominally for temperature sensors. Temperature inputs can also be configured to monitor voltage. All inputs are scaled to the nominal 5 V ADC, full-scale range and converted two channels at a time with 16-bit precision.
